details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.3 Uncalibrated/Device colour spaces - DeviceGray
details.description: DeviceGray shall only be used if a device independent DefaultGray colour space has been set when the DeviceGray colour space is used, or if a PDF/A OutputIntent is in effect.
